Necross/ Splattercannon:

"Then we'll send Splattercannon and one of you in to scout their 
defenses.  Then we'll all go in, if need be."
Splattercannon transformed and held his position, waiting for further 
instructions. 



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
BlackNightmare:

 
"Should we do a plan.... Or just STrike them??" asked the femme
 
--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
Necross/ Splattercannon:
  
"Soon, we will destroy the Maximals and achieve a great victory 
for Unicron.  Onward!"
Necross' battlecry sent shivers up his own spine, and then he and 
Splattercannon dove forward, heading straight for the Maximals'base.
